name: Let's Chat 2
description:
Welcome to Let’s Chat, a game which places you in a custom operating system and shows you first-hand how dangerous chatting with strangers can be. Welcome to the game, and good luck.

NOTE

It was reported that on some computers game crashes if not ran with administrator rights, so for the best experience run it in administrator rights, turn off your lights and use headphones!

If you would like to support me on Patreon you can do so here: https://www.patreon.com/elm0
